attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fathers are good parents but the current law in this country gives us no rights over our own children. This is old, sexist and out of date and the law needs changing NOW.
Why are mothers naturally assumed as the ideal parent when most unmarried mothers use the children as bargaining tools with local authorities and the father.
We should not let children be used as weapons by selfish single minded mothers.
Give Fathers Rights... NOW.
Please sign up and change the future of our children for the better.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
